text: [instrumental music]

- Hey.
- Hi.
What are you guys doin' up?

Oh, we wanted to finish the
crossword before we went to bed.

Hey, do you know
a six-letter word for red?
Dark red!

Yeah, I think that's wrong,
but there's a "Connect the Dots"
in here for you later.
Hey, how about, uh, maroon?
Yes, you are so smart!
Aww, you guys are so cute.
I know.

Alright, I'll see you
in the mornin'.

- Okay.
- Okay.

You know, I love doing crossword
puzzles with you, honey.
Ah. Me, too.

Now let's finish this
and go to bed.
Okay.
There's only one left.
Three-letter word..
...not dog, but..
Cat.
Yes!
You are so smart.
I love you.
I love you too.
[siren wailing in distance]
Oh, I..

- Hi, Joe.
- Yeah..

I didn't know you guys
were gonna be here.

Hey, Joey? Do me a favor,
sweetie. Taste this.
What? Why?

- What is going on with you?
- Nothin'.

Oh, come on. You've been
acting strange all day.
Alright.

There is somethin'.
I, uh..
I kinda had a dream..

...but I don't wanna
talk about it.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!

What if Martin Luther King
had said that?
I...kinda have a dream.

Yeah...I don't wanna
talk about it.
Well...it involved Monica.

You had a dream about
a girl that I'm seeing?

Oh, that is so cool.
I can't tell you

how many times I dreamt about
a girl that he was seeing.

Anyway, we're talking
about your dream. I love you.
Your dream?

Look, don't worry. There wasn't
any sex in it or anything.

I haven't dreamt
about her like that

since I found out about
you two...ish.
What was the dream about?
Well...okay.
You were my girlfriend..

...and we were doin'
the crossword puzzle.

You know, like you guys
were doin' last night.
So, that's it.

I'm in love with Monica,
and I'll be movin' out.
Wait, Joey, Joey.

That doesn't mean that-that
you're in love with me.

- It...it doesn't?
- No, no. It can mean anything..

...like, uh,
all of a sudden you're jealous

that I've become
the apartment stud.

Kinda sounds like
your dream, dude.

Or it could mean that you saw
Chandler and me together

and, you know,
we were being close and stuff

and-and maybe you just wanna
have that with someone, too.

Well, in the dream,
I did enjoy the closeness.
Mm-hmm.

Okay, look, look.
Are you attracted to Monica?

Right here, right now,
are you attracted to her?

- Not really.
- Well, there you have it.

Well, sure, I'm just
wearing sweats.

But that's good...that
you're not in love with me

because...you just
want a girlfriend.

No, I don't think
it's just about

just gettin' a girlfriend,
you know?

I mean, yeah, I could
get a girlfriend.

Yeah, we could sit in the chair
and do crossword puzzles

but, you know, we ever have the
closeness like you guys have?

Well, you know,
Monica and I were friends

before we started dating.
So maybe, maybe that's it.
Friends first?
That's interesting.
You become friends after?
No. Never done that, either.
